content/2019-05-07.json.title: Perfect Now vs Perfect Later
content/2019-05-07.json.preview: Our frontend code had duplication stemming from over-eager classical inheritance patterns. There were multiple levels of inheritance that had to be traversed to understand how a certain page’s logic would differ from another, very similar page.
